attributes.action: APPEAL TO THE DANISH GOVERNMENT THROUGH THE EU TO STOP THE SLAUGHTER IN DANTESQUE,FAROE ISLANDS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
While it may seem incredible,even today this custom continues,in Dantesque,-in the Faroe islands,(Denmark).
A country supposedly 'civilized'and an EU country at that,for many people this attack on these beautiful animals is virtually unknown-a custom to 'show'entering into adulthood.
It is absolutely atrocious,it seems that nothing has been done to put a stop to this barbarism being committed against the Calderon,an intelligent dophin that is placid and approaches humans(if you can call them that)out of friendliness and trust.
Please stop this blood bath in the sea,when I saw the photo's I thought OH MY GOD!!!!!can this really happen in these so called modern times.
OH AND WHERE IS GREENPEACE?
